title: Linux ncftp Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the ncftp command to connect to FTP servers, manage files and directories on the server, and perform various file transfer operations in a Linux environment.

meta.title: Linux ncftp Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Learn how to use the ncftp command to connect to FTP servers, manage files and directories on the server, and perform various file transfer operations in a Linux environment.
meta.keywords: ncftp, FTP, file transfer, Linux, networking, command line, file management
